definition: distantly remote/also written 邈遠|邈远[miao3 yuan3]
(of an expanse of water) vast/distant and indistinct/tiny or insignificant
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: A far sea moves in my ear.
sentences.chinese: 一聲渺遠的海浪聲傳入我的耳朵。

sentences.english: The sun is cold, burning through the frosty distances of space.
sentences.chinese: 太陽很冷，它在渺遠而冰冷的空中燃燒着。
